posts.post_title: Remaining 9 T206 cards (with Beckley and Wheat) available individually or discounted lot
posts.post_content:
Posted By: brian p
  Remaining 9 cards available individually (Atz, Beckley,Chappelle, Dorner, Doyle, Howell, Lake, Schlei and Wheat)or as a lot of 9 for $116.00, which is a 20% discount.

    The backs are in decent condition unless noted.  The grades are based upon cards appearance; any major condition flaw has been noted and prices adjusted accordingly.  Shipping included. Larger scans available upon request.




Individual cards for sale:
